CustomField.formula: CASE( Material_Status__c , "40","40 Saleable", "60","60 Discont pend'g stock", "Z1","Z1 Constrained Product", "Z8","Z8 Discontinued Pending Stock", "01","01 Discontinued w/o replacement", "02","02 Discontinued w replacement", "03","03 Technical defect", "04","04 Test Part", "11","11 Under Development", "20","20 Pre-Sales only", "50","50 Limited Availability", "70","70 Archive", "80","80 Obsolete-No Activity", "90","90 Obsolete+Cred+Debit", "99","99 Temp Stop Shipment", "Z2","Z2 Discontinued w/o replacement", "Z3","Z3 Discontinued w replacement", "Z4","Z4 Technical defect", "Z5","Z5 Under Development", "Z6","Z6 Pre-Sales Only", "Z7","Z7 Limited Availability", "Z9","Z9 Archive", "ZM","ZM Moved To Sa/Org US10", "ZO","ZO Obsolete-No Activity", "ZQ","ZQ Insufficient License", "ZR","ZR Under R&D Development", "ZT","ZT Temp Stop Shipment", "ZU","ZU Obsolete w Replacement", "Unknown Status" )
CustomField.label: Material Status Description
